words.source: H6279 Hiphil imv. 2mp of עָתַר 'to pray, entreat'; KJV 'intreat', ESV 'plead', NASB 'make supplication'
H413 prep. 'to, toward'; all trans. agree
H3068 divine name, Tetragrammaton; KJV 'the LORD', ESV 'the LORD', NASB 'the LORD'
H7227 waw + adj.ms rav 'much, great'; KJV 'for it is enough', ESV 'for there has been enough', NASB 'for there has been enough'
H1961 prep. min + Qal inf. constr. of הָיָה 'to be'; KJV 'that there be', ESV 'of', NASB 'of'
H6963 n.mp constr. qolot 'voices, thunders'; KJV 'mighty thunderings', ESV 'God's thunder', NASB 'God's thunder'
H430 n.mp ʾelohim 'God, gods'; KJV 'mighty', ESV 'God's', NASB 'God's'
H1259 waw + n.ms barad 'hail'; KJV 'and hail', ESV 'and hail', NASB 'and hail'
H7971 waw + Piel cohortative 1cs of שָׁלַח 'to send'; KJV 'and I will let you go', ESV 'I will let you go', NASB 'I will let you go'
H853 direct object marker + 2mp suff.; KJV 'you', ESV 'you', NASB 'you'
H3808 waw + neg. part. loʾ 'not'; KJV 'and ye shall stay no longer', ESV 'and you shall stay no longer', NASB 'and you shall stay no longer'
H3254 Hiphil impf. 2mp + paragogic nun of יָסַף 'to add, continue'; KJV 'shall stay', ESV 'shall stay', NASB 'shall stay'
H5975 prep. l- + Qal inf. constr. of עָמַד 'to stand'; KJV 'no longer', ESV 'no longer', NASB 'no longer'
